abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: construction
            and equipping of an upper secondary technical school in Port
            Gentil; construction and equipping of a lower secondary
            technical school in Libreville; construction of additional
            boarding places for the National School of Commerce in Port
            Gentil and of additional boarding places and classrooms for
            the National Forestry School in Cap Esterias; introduction
            of a technology course at two lower general secondary
            schools in the Libreville area; setting up of a Publications
            Unit for educational materials in Libreville; consulting
            services and fellowships.
